title: How to make a bluetooth device that set an alarm when our phone out of the bluetooth device range - Quora

response.answer_text: This can easily done via using an BLE Beacon. There are many clones of these in the market and they inherently provide the function of proximity detection. As soon as phone is out of range of BLE beacon, phone can be put on listening the BLE device signal strength via a simple app, the alarm can go off on the phone or vice versa. I hope this helps
